Constructor Detail

ConnectionImpl

public ConnectionImpl(java.lang.String host,
                      int port)
               throws KxException,
                      java.io.IOException
Connects to the kdb+ process at the given host and port. This uses the user.name system property to log in.

Parameters:
host - the remote kdb+ host
port - the port on which kdb+ is listening
Throws:
KxException
java.io.IOException

ConnectionImpl

public ConnectionImpl(java.lang.String host,
                      int port,
                      java.lang.String credentials)
               throws KxException,
                      java.io.IOException
Connects to the kdb+ process at the given host and port and with the given credentials.

Parameters:
host - the remote kdb+ host
port - the port on which kdb+ is listening
credentials - the username:password string to log in with
Throws:
KxException
java.io.IOException

ConnectionImpl

Parameters:
socket - the socket on which to listen
Throws:
java.io.IOException
